request.bodyJSON: {"input":[{"content":"What's the weather in San Francisco?","role":"user","type":"message"}],"model":"gpt-5-mini","stream":false,"tools":[{"description":"Get the current weather for a location","name":"get_weather","parameters":{"properties":{"location":{"description":"City and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA","type":"string"},"unit":{"description":"Temperature unit (celsius or fahrenheit)","type":"string"}},"required":["location"],"type":"object"},"type":"function"}]}
